Question
========
In which analysis do you have a low probability of Type I error due to the familywise error rate?

Answerlist
----------
* The approximate F-test for Pillai's trace in MANOVA
* A series of one-way ANOVAs testing a common research question
* A series of post-hoc tests without Bonferoni correction of a between factor with more than 2 categories in a Mixed-Design ANOVA
* The non-orthogonal contrasts of a one-way ANOVA

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
